title: Heartbroken groom marries his fiancée at her funeral to fulfil her dying wish
text:

A grieving partner has given his fiancee her final wish by marrying her - despite her dying before they could have their dream wedding.

Xu Shinan, 35, tied the knot with Yang Liu at a joint wedding and funeral service following her tragic death from breast cancer at the age of 34.

She had fought a brave battle for five-and-a-half years and Xu discovered that right up until her death she was till planning to marry him.

The service took place at a funeral parlour in Dalian, eastern China, on Sunday, and was attended by the couple's family and friends, the Dalian Evening News reports.

(Image: Asia Wire / Xu Shinan)

Speaking to Yang as she lay in her coffin, Xu said: "All that I can do is to fulfil your wish and letting you wear a wedding dress fulfils my wish."

The dedicated husband carried out the Chinese tradition of staying by her side in mourning for seven days following her death.

He said: "My wife used to say that nobody was allowed to cry should she die.

"I was holding back my tears on the day, but when [her body] was sent for cremation, I couldn't fight it anymore."

(Image: Asia Wire / Xu Shinan)

The couple, who met at university and had been together for 12 years, had planned to get married when Yang was diagnosed with breast cancer at the age of 28.

They put their marriage plans on hold while Yang went through multiple surgeries and gruelling rounds of chemotherapy.

The couple resumed their wedding plans in 2017 after Yang's conditioned improved and began saving to buy a home together.

But a year later the cancer returned and was more aggressive.

(Image: AsiaWire)

The devastated couple travelled all over China to find the best medical treatment but Yang's condition deteriorated and she became bed-bound in July this year.

Yang had to be put into a coma on October 6 after she suffered multiple bone fractures from sneezing due to her fragility and she died a week later.

Xu said: "She couldn't even recognise me in the end and we didn't bid farewell."

After her death, Xu had discovered an online shopping cart and realised that Yang had been shopping for wedding dresses just before she died.

(Image: Asia Wire / Xu Shinan)

He said: "I promised to buy her the most beautiful wedding gown."

The owner of the shop where Xu looked for a gown is said to have been so touched by the couple's story he allowed to him buy anyone he wanted for just one Yuan - 11 pence.
description: Xu Shinan, 35, tied the knot with Yang Liu after he found out she was still planning their dream wedding right up until her death from breast cancer
